alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pearl River County through 445 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Poplarville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplarville. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 26 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
